description: This file contains the CSS styles for a React-based Todo application, defining various UI elements such as themes, buttons, lists, and layout adjustments for different screen sizes.

classes.name: ocean-bg
classes.description: Styles for the background with a gradient effect.

classes.name: ocean-surface
classes.description: Main card style for content display with padding, margin, and box shadow.

classes.name: ocean-header
classes.description: Styles for the header section including flex layout and bottom border.

classes.name: add-todo-bar
classes.description: Style for the input area where new todos are added, including layout and spacing.

classes.name: todo-list-ul
classes.description: Styles for the todo list layout.

classes.name: todo-item
classes.description: Styles for individual todo items with transition effects.

classes.name: todo-status-bar
classes.description: Styles for the status bar displaying todo filters and item counts.

classes.name: todo-empty-state
classes.description: Style for the empty state message when no todos are present.
